1.text: Spray the inside of a large, microwave-safe mug with cooking spray.

2.text: Combine the dry ingredients in the mug.
2.vid: /4/4f/Make Cake in a Mug Step 2 Version 4.360p.mp4

3.vid: /7/79/Make Cake in a Mug Step 3 Version 4.360p.mp4

4.text: Stir in some sprinkles, if desired.
4.vid: /0/0d/Make Cake in a Mug Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /a/af/Make Cake in a Mug Step 5 Version 4.360p.mp4

6.text: Allow the cake to cool slightly before eating it.

7.text: Grease the inside of a large, microwave-safe mug.

8.text: Mix all of the dry ingredients in the mug.
8.vid: /c/c2/Make Cake in a Mug Step 8 Version 4.360p.mp4

9.vid: /3/37/Make Cake in a Mug Step 9 Version 4.360p.mp4

10.text: Cook the cake on HIGH for 90 seconds.

11.text: Allow the cake to cool for 2 to 3 minutes before serving it.

12.text: Grease the inside of a large, microwave-safe mug.

13.text: Combine the dry ingredients in the mug.
13.vid: /c/c0/Make Cake in a Mug Step 13 Version 4.360p.mp4

14.vid: /3/37/Make Cake in a Mug Step 14 Version 4.360p.mp4

15.text: Cook the cake for 1 ½ to 2 minutes on HIGH in the microwave.
15.vid: /5/56/Make Cake in a Mug Step 15 Version 4.360p.mp4

16.text: Allow the cake to cool before serving it.

17.text: Grease the inside of a large, microwave-safe mug.

18.vid: /d/d6/Make Cake in a Mug Step 18 Version 4.360p.mp4

19.vid: /7/70/Make Cake in a Mug Step 19 Version 4.360p.mp4

20.text: Cook the cake for 50 to 60 seconds.
20.vid: /4/41/Make Cake in a Mug Step 20 Version 4.360p.mp4

21.text: Allow the cake to rest for 30 minutes.

22.text: Prepare the cream cheese frosting, if desired.
22.vid: /3/35/Make Cake in a Mug Step 22 Version 4.360p.mp4

23.text: Pipe the frosting onto the cake.
